string.text: What happened? He's dead??? Come back now! Immediately!
What the hell happened? He's dead??? Hurry up and complete the readings. Get back as quickly as you can!
Good work, Stalker. You've managed to locate the machine. Now find a way to switch it off...
We need you to do this so we can study it further, and understand its purpose. Please hurry!
I'm afraid the prototype will not protect you from strong emissions for long...
Once the timer runs out, the unit will totally stop working. That means it will no longer protect you! You must hurry - and whatever happens, keep an eye on the timer!

YES! You disabled it! Excellent work, Stalker. Now, you must be careful. A couple of Military helicopters have arrived, and they'll want to know what's happened. They'll be looking for whoever's responsible...
You'd be better off looking for a different way out than how you went in. We'll be waiting for you here back at the lab. Once again, well done!
